duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead the furniture team and drive furniture sales, ensuring departmental performance and sales metrics are met.
Provide work direction, coaching, and feedback to furniture sales team members, including training and customer service.
Maintain furniture department inventory, conduct cycle counts, and identify furniture display needs for merchandising standards.
Develop plans for furniture department coverage during special events and strive to improve sales performance.
Serve as Manager on Duty, providing leadership to floor associates and ensuring customer service standards are met.
Assist with recovery of the entire store as needed and drive the customer experience for resolving customer issues.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma, GED, or equivalent work experience required.
